item.description:
Ted Leo Fans,

This is the show you've been waiting for. Ted Leo and Pharmacists will be performing at the Roxy on Saturday, December 1st at

6:30PM. It looks like it is going to be an early show. I have actually never been to the Roxy so i'm not sure what is around

the area for good bars or restaurants. I was thinking that we could meetup outside the show and grab a drink after the show

at a bar in the area. I've randomly chosen Bishop's Pub, which is located near the Boylston stop on the Green line and a

short walk to Park Street as well. If any of you have any suggestions for somewhere to meetup after, let me know. It will be

a great show.

If you haven't listened to Ted Leo, here is a link to his myspace page

http://www.myspace.co...

See you at the show

Michael
item.name: Ted Leo - Roxy - December 1st
